website_summaries.verdict: Ignore the goofy name: The Oontz 3 Plus delivers about as good sound as you'll get from a $35 Bluetooth speaker.
pros: Cambridge Soundworks' Oontz Angle 3 Plus manages to deliver fairly rich sound despite its small size and relatively low price
It also has excellent battery life, is water-resistant and has speakerphone capabilities

customer_reviews.title: Sound cuts on iPhone 6S Plus if within 5 feet of speaker.
customer_reviews.text: ** 4/28 UPDATE:** Cambridge Soundworks heard of my defective product and sent me a full replacement and a case! Everything works as intended! I've had both the OONTZ 2 and now the 3 plus and the sound quality is amazing for the price point. Thank you so much for resolving my issue! ****** So the speaker works great on my iPhone 6s Plus... as long as the phone is at least 5 feet away from the speaker. The sound cuts out if the phone is closer than that. Other than that, the product works as intended...
customer_reviews.author: Happy Sal

customer_reviews.title: Replaced my custom 200W system (and its pretty close)
customer_reviews.text: I got this to replace my stereo system. Trying to de-clutter and downsize. Obviously, the sound is way better and balanced on a pair of 120W Sony speakers, fuller, richer... But for the size, the OontZ Plus really blew me away. Listening to orchestra music on it as I type this, and I just can't believe the deep bass, and beautiful strings. Not kidding, almost comparable to an old pair of fishers I used to have. Yeah, I don't "feel it" thumping through the air, but my ears can tell. For the price, well well worth it. I bought this over the soundworks because of the water resistance and battery. Haven't charged it yet...
customer_reviews.author: IBuyStuffOnAmazon

customer_reviews.title: sturdy and solid speaker!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this speaker AUG 2017 and it stopped working after 4 months. I took very good care as I always do with all my electronics. One thing that really irritated me is the shortness of battery life. It's much shorter than 5 hours or so as described. Also, the on switch is very irritating. Bad design, bad battery life. Made in China, and of course, it died in 4 months. What's wrong OontZ?
customer_reviews.author: MotivatedChaps

customer_reviews.title: Nice speaker but problems with the bass.
customer_reviews.text: I prefer their earlier version of the speaker (Cambridge SoundWorks OontZ Angle 3 with a firmware update): primarily because of the better bass. This one's description claims a "richer bass". My primary usage of this speaker is listening to audio books. The deeper voices sound like they have a very slight echo. I haven't tested their claim, of roughly doubling the battery time. It seems to have come at the expense of slightly larger size and weight (5 1/4" .59 lbs versus 6 1/2" .80 lbs). So this speaker will sit in a lesser used area of the house and I'll stay with the earlier version for my primary listening.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Heavily disappointed! I wanted this to be my new wireless ...
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited about this portable speaker and so excited when it arrived. I charged it fully and used it one time for about an hour, and the next time I went to use it....NOTHING. Doesn't work. Charging does nothing, no lights come on, no sound. I've had several people look at and try to get it to work...NOTHING. Heavily disappointed! I wanted this to be my new wireless travel speaker, and I got exactly ONE HOUR of use from it. SUCKS.
customer_reviews.author: KFurrStone

customer_reviews.title: Competes with the best portable speakers in every way but price
customer_reviews.text: Eat your heart out Bose and Beats. Sounds crazy, I know, but after buying this little guy and listening to it compared to the Beats Pill (which does sound great) the value and quality of this make it a no brainer. If I had paid 100$ for this product, my review would be no different. Bravo!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Grow

customer_reviews.title: Bigly disappointed!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this speaker, the volume the size and the texture is amazing. However, the Bluetooth connectivity on my unit was horrible. This ultimately lead to me returning the unit extremely dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Leon Theodore

customer_reviews.title: Better, the second time around...
customer_reviews.text: The first speaker I recieved was dead on arrival. Charged it overnight but it would not turn on. No blue light. Went through the reset procedure twice, but still no dice... Then I emailed Cambridge SoundWorks customer service. Within minutes I got a reply, and shortly was offered a replacement. It arrived in 2 days and this one worked as it was supposed to. It immediately linked to to my Iphone, Ipad, and HP laptop. It stayed connected up to about a 30' distance. I wouldn't exactly call the sound it produced high fidelity, but certainly acceptable for a $35 bluetooth speaker. I'll keep it!
customer_reviews.author: Duster

customer_reviews.title: It's easy to reach the controls while riding since they are ...
customer_reviews.text: I ride 5 mornings/week...this fits perfectly in a water bottle cage...have about 500 miles on it in rain or clear skies. It's easy to reach the controls while riding since they are positioned on the end of the unit instead of on the side. I ride with 125psi tire pressure which means the shocks/vibrations transferred from the bike frame are constant and undamped. Sound quality is excellent for such a small and rugged speaker; battery life is good. I'll come back and edit this if it fails; I ride 6k+ miles per/year. So far, so good. This speaker is worth much more to me than the purchase price on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Palm Beach County

customer_reviews.title: Good enough but not for me...
customer_reviews.text: Good enough speaker but this was my second Bluetooth speaker that I bought after the Anker SoundCore speaker. The two do not even compare! For the same price, it felt, I was getting much less. The Anker speaker was: more compact, sounded better, felt more solid / hefty, had butons on top of a longer side with easy access, the design seemed more water resistant with less holes and sims. Returned this one back and bought a second one of the SoundCore instead!
customer_reviews.author: YaroslavTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and Compact
customer_reviews.text: Needed a wifi speaker for the gift shop at work and this has been a peach of a product. We use Velcro to hold the speaker in place and out of the way and the product has held up being put up and taken down each night. Sometimes it goes several days without being recharged and it still continues to play. The sound from the small unit is amazing. We get a strong sound without turning the volume up all the way, and don't get any crackling or cutting out. Would definately purchase this mini speaker again.
customer_reviews.author: V Ivey

customer_reviews.title: loved the little thing
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased the original Oontz back int he day and loved it, when it died after a respectable period of time, I purchased the plus. I recently had issues with it within a short time of purchasing it, and wrote a questioning review of it. Without prompting them, Cambridge SoundWorks reached out to me and did their best to make things right. Apparently it must have been damaged during shipping which affected the lifespan of the unit. These guys are standup and stand behind their products 100%, I will definitely be a return customer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound & very loud for a tiny speaker!
customer_reviews.text: Love this speaker gave it to my boyfriend to use with his phone since his phone speaker doesn’t work well. Unfortunately, now there is something loose at the charging port, as he has to make sure the cable is in just a certain way or else it won’t charge. It wasn’t dropped or moved a lot so not sure about the quality charging port connection. When I had it, I just left it plugged in all the time. The boyfriend likes to charge it, then take it with him in the other room. So I’d say be careful putting it on & off the charger. I’d still buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Long Lasting Portable Sound.
customer_reviews.text: Since buying two of the OontZ Angle 3 Plus speakers over two years ago, BOTH are still working, both used quite often and have been very helpful while paired to a smart phone. As advertised, the sound clarity is among the best of the many portable Bluetooth speakers I have used. Only negative for me is volume. Being an old rocker, I desire loud or even louder, but NO device I have ran across provides thumping, ground shaking sound, which I suppose, is entwined into power consumption and of course, speaker longevity. That said, the Oontz systems are most superior to other similar products. Not 5 stars only because of volume issue.
customer_reviews.author: joelfarm

customer_reviews.title: It's not very loud...
customer_reviews.text: I maxed out my speaker when listening to music and in the end, it still produces a lackluster sound and other things drown out the speaker. Simple things like washing dishes, or neighbors television, or the school 3 blocks away is louder than the speaker next to me is disturbing. It's ideal for a nice quiet comfortable setting, but to increase battery life in lieu of audio level is a poor trade.
customer_reviews.author: ShadowfoX

customer_reviews.title: Good for this price level
customer_reviews.text: For a while this was a great speaker for me. Easy to use. Very portable. Battery lasts very long. Reasonable price. I use it for general listening & meditation music. I noticed that some of the detail of the softer sounds was not clear. So I decided to buy a $99 speaker (Soundcore Motion+ if it matters). The sound is WAY better. More than twice. Though it's also twice the size & weight. So it depends on what you want & how much you can pay. For less than $50 & portability, I was very happy with this speaker. For detailed sound quality, depends on what music you listen to or how much that matters.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Opinion

customer_reviews.title: Great ... until it wasn't.tro
customer_reviews.text: Like all other Made in China junk, this worked great until it didn't. Sound quality was excellent for the size/price, but once it goes, it's frustrating as hell. After just a few months it failed to pair with both my laptop and phone. It said paired, my phone and computer both showed it as paired, yet failed to actually link to either machine. Messed with it for an entire evening before calling it quits. I can say that it withstands direct violent hits to the wall quite well. Bluetooth light is still blinking after throwing it across the room multiple times.... just won't pair with anything or function as intended.
customer_reviews.author: chandra orr

customer_reviews.title: This proves the value of checking reviews
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an inexpensive portable Bluetooth speaker that I could use outside (on porch, bike and boat) that had some degree of weather protection. I was very impressed with the number of positive reviews of Oontz Angle speakers and chose the Angle 3 PLUS due to the extended battery life. It was delivered in 2 days and came almost fully charged. The ease of pairing to 2 iPhones was a snap. Using Alexa to control Amazon Music with voice commands was another unexpected benefit. Sound quality is great (but I’m no expert). I also like the feature that the device turns itself off after15 min of inactivity.
customer_reviews.author: DOUGLAS P

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, plenty loud, and great battery life
customer_reviews.text: I really like this speaker, but a couple issues prevent me from giving it the full 5 stars. First, the color. Yes, black is great and all, but sitting in the sun, this sucker gets pretty hot, which I can't believe is good for the battery/electronics. Second, the indicator light is very dim. It's fine if you're indoors, but get out in the sun, and you cannot see whether it's on/off, or paired. Finally, the buttons - they're difficult to see (just raised patterns of black on black). I wish they had a different color overlay, or something, to make them easy to identify.
customer_reviews.author: gewf631

customer_reviews.title: 90 Day Warranty Speaks Volumes About Quality
customer_reviews.text: Good speaker for the price but it had a very short life. I bought mine 13 months prior to this review. It got light use, yet as of June 2018 it no longer held a charge and would only work when plugged in. In addition, it began having trouble staying connected via Bluetooth. I checked the warranty and was sadly surprised it was only 90 days! Another brand of similar speaker comes with an 18 month warranty. (Hint- that brand starts with A).
customer_reviews.author: dogmother

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Love these speakers! Easy to connect, easy to use and gives great, clear sound with nice loud volume. We've used it for get-togethers both indoors and outdoors, at the beach and around the house to listen to music, podcasts, youtube vids etc. We initially bought just one, but was so impressed with it, we bought a second. Having 2 of these speakers allows you to connect them to each other for surround sound and/or allow for a greater range (ex. having one inside and other outside for a house party). I even bought one for my mom as a gift and she uses it all the time! Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey K

customer_reviews.title: Annoying white noise when it's not playing music
customer_reviews.text: The big drawback of this little speaker is that while it's on, it makes a LOUD sound of white noise. You can't hear it while music or a podcast is playing; but between tracks you sure can. And it continues as long as the thing as still on. I couldn't stand it, I had to return it and instead got the Anker Soundcore 2. Now that thing is AWESOME. Ten bucks more, but oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Big sound in a petite package!
customer_reviews.text: WOW what a great speaker. After wading through so many different choices from low to high end this was my choice. Purchase based on familiarity with full size speakers from Cambridge Sound as well as user reviews. This speaker is everything PLUS a bag of chips! Impeccably packaged, arrived fully charged, instant Bluetooth connectivity with iPhone and iPad outstanding sound quality all in a tiny package. Did not expect the sound to be so rich with distinct crisp base, midrange, even highs - no hissing or muddy tones. Impressive performance for the price. Would recommend this little gem for anyone looking for high quality at a reasonable price. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: ScienceRules

customer_reviews.title: Worked great! Died after 3 months!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because of the affordable price and great reviews. I used it several times after getting it then went about a good month without touching it. It connected to my phone and other devices just fine. Suddenly after pairing it one day and playing a song no sound came out. I did all the troubleshooting steps. Then I plugged the cord in and took it off of Bluetooth. Same problem. No sound. Not sure what happens or why it died. Used it maybe a total of 10x and it died in 2 months. Maybe I just got the one lemon out of all them.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: My kids love it and it plays so clear even at it's highest volume and has long playing time before needing to be recharged.
customer_reviews.text: I bought TWO of these for my kids for Christmas. Now I regret it because they are constantly playing their music loudly!! When I go to complain they tell me it's my fault because I bought this for them, then I realize they are right. They sound so nice and clear even when it's at it's highest volume. I had bought an OontZ for myself last summer and thought it was a great little portable speaker but this one is much better because it has a much longer playing time between charges. I believe this one plays for over thirty hours whereas mine only plays for about twelve before needing to be recharged.
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: This little bluetooth speaker is amazing sounding.
customer_reviews.text: I have quite a few b\t speakers at home and some cost 2 and 3 times the price and this Oontz speaker puts them all to shame, built like alittle tank so theirs no raddles anywhere when listening some small speakers like this have a very shrill sounding high end, not these speakers...these speakers produce the perfect high end the perfect amount of midrange and just the right amount of bass, the only downside i see is when you get this speaker home you won't want to listen to your other bluetooth speakers...at this price this purchase is a no brainer.
customer_reviews.author: MJA56

customer_reviews.title: Expected Better Quality Sound
customer_reviews.text: The OontZ Angle 3 PLUS speaker has incredible battery life, pretty good bass, somewhat muddy mid range and okay highs (if you use the right app with a good equalizer). I found playing straight from the phone's built in apps wasn't so great but I downloaded another app with powerful settings and controls that bring out the best of this speaker. The OontZ Angle 3 PLUS has two speakers and 10 watts of power. There's a passive bass radiator. I never really thought those added much. All in all it's a decent speaker that kicks up my shower and shaving time. I got this on a Lightning Deal for a nice discount. I would not pay the full asking price.
customer_reviews.author: Keith B.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Baby/Toddler's Rooms
customer_reviews.text: We got two of these for each of our sons' rooms, and they work great! (Though it is a little funny to hear the bass come out in lullabies!) They are both connected to a different old iTouch, and we keep them plugged in all the time because we run music continuously through the night. We have to keep the iTouch for my toddler's music in a different room (because he will otherwise get out of bed to play with it), so the bluetooth feature was an unexpected must! Once or twice we've had it lose connection, but it's fixed after disabling and reconnecting it.
customer_reviews.author: Christy Exstrum

customer_reviews.title: The must Have for outdoor pool fun and strolling guitar play
customer_reviews.text: This little gem is fabulous. We have two of them. We use them for outside in the summer doing yard work or just floating in the pool. I even use it to play my guitar... YES play my guitar. I have a VOX Classic Rock Amp Plug. I use the Auxiliary cable that comes with the Oonz and plug straight into the Amp Plug. Then I can sit and play or stroll about playing some tunes. The item arrived in good time and in good condition. No complaints, and it has been at least a year or more so far.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Castles

customer_reviews.title: Great little BT speaker - Bought 2nd one
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a small speaker to take with me to the pool and to use when I am working in the yard. This little gem met all my expectations. It synced up with all of my apple devices with no issue. Battery life is great (6-8 hours easily) and doesn't have a lot of dormant battery draw (so if you don't use it for a while, it still has juice). The sound is great. Music is clear and loud for such a small device. I use it mostly for podcasts, so I can't give you all the audiophile lingo. But it sounds great. We bought one as a gift for 17YO nephew and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: KWalker

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the $24 I paid.
customer_reviews.text: I bought three of these on sale for $24 each. That was a great deal and well worth it. They are water resistant have good sound and connect well to my iPhone via Bluetooth. My complaint is connecting with an auxiliary cable. You can do that but you may or may not get hissing and crackling noises. This happens on all three of them and I consider that a defect. If you want a cheap, but good sounding, water-resistant Bluetooth speaker, this is a great choice.
customer_reviews.author: Taney

customer_reviews.title: Excellent device. But...
customer_reviews.text: [Edit] The USB charging port is the weak link. As with any micro-USB charging port, eventually it breaks and the whole device is screwed. That's a shame. It would be far better if the charging port was on a tiny daughter-board for easy replacement. Better yet? Wireless charging. [Original review] I never give 5 stars. This is the rare exception. Excellent device. Sounds great, RIDICULOUSLY long battery life. Bluetooth range is insane. Works great paired with a Chromebook for dealing with sound in conference room Google Hangouts where conversation is more important than the video feed (as in any working conference). Good amplitude for noisy environments.
customer_reviews.author: rasqual

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad
customer_reviews.text: Good speaker for the cost. Long lasting battery life; above average volume and adequate lows but the speaker cannot stand side-by-side with other more costly brands such as the JBL Flip. If that’s what you require (louder with more low end), I suggest paying a bit more and buy another product. However the OontZ Angle 3 will do the job for the cost. Overall, as I mentioned in my opening statement, this product is appropriately priced.
customer_reviews.author: JLH6281

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shower speaker!
customer_reviews.text: Love love loveeeeee this! Bought it to use in my bathroom/shower. Provides a quality and loud sound. Battery life is great. I use it daily while getting ready. I take in into the shower while showering, and set it on my counter while not showering. Product is water resistant, and is definitely wet after I shower. I keep it on a shelf, so it never receives a direct hit from the shower, but it is wet enough that I towel it off afterwards. Product is not meant to be fully submerged in water, but it definitely withstands the wetness from being on a shelf in my shower! Great sound whether used for music or podcasts. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Bonny B

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker for outdoors!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this speaker to take on camping trips and have used it probably a dozen times in those circumstances alone. It's small and also very durable and compact which makes it easy to pack among our gear. It's very easy to use and we love that it's Bluetooth so doesn't require any extra cables/cords. The sound quality is great as is the range in volume. We can also attest to its water resistance as it has been exposed to some light rain and did not suffer any damage. This is a great, quality speaker for the price and we would definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: I Love It
customer_reviews.text: Purchased on 04-06-2017, and today 01-05-2018 it has stopped working. It was a very good speaker while it lasted but from the reviews i would have thought it would have lasted longer than 8+ months.. Update: After being contacted by Cambridge SoundWorks concerning this matter. Received the replacement speaker today. It connected on the first try to my blue tooth. It sounds awesome. I thank them for their timely consideration in this matter. I raised my star rating to 5 both because i love the sound of this speaker and the company standing behind their product.
customer_reviews.author: J C

customer_reviews.title: Excelent product, great sound, very nice price!
customer_reviews.text: Great speakers! I just got them and love them! It looks very well made, the sound is amazing. I even compare the sound to my JBL Flip and they sound pretty much the same.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Armando

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SPEAKER
customer_reviews.text: I truly love speaker for the price I got it for. I was looking for a bluetooth speaker for when I go back to college but I did not want to pay no expensive price for a "beat" speaker and I came across this. I loved it soo much and how well it function that I end up buying the bluetooth earphone from the same company because the ones I had before (different brand) was completely crap. My would literally cut on when I was walking and my phone was in my pocket and the rang on it was crap.
customer_reviews.author: Hakeem

customer_reviews.title: Sure doesn’t match descrip or reviews. Horrible!!
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely not a top of the line speaker. I bought based on reviews and I wish I had returned it. I’m horrible at returning things which is why I read 1000’s of reviews before buying something. This is no where close to the reviews I read about it. I’d say go up a notch and pay a lil more money or you’ll regret it. I sure do!
customer_reviews.author: Lynette Agueda

customer_reviews.title: This speaker is absolutely brilliant. Is it going to shake the gym walls ...
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is absolutely brilliant. Is it going to shake the gym walls off? No of course not. But I have used it in a mini-auditorium and it really puts some sound out. I mostly use this is in my classroom and it is fantastic. I love how small it is. The only complaint (and it is not enough to take away a star) is that the buttons are on the side so it can be a little awkward trying to turn it on and off and up and down. But seriously this is the greatest speaker. PS-I have tested it against the OontZ Angle 3 original and it is only slightly louder. But they are both great products.
customer_reviews.author: Southern Charm

customer_reviews.title: Can't Recommend This
customer_reviews.text: Bought this a little over a year ago. Sounds grear, appears sturdy, but just doesn't get the job done. First, I've bought two carrying cases for this and both became defective and not able to do their job writhing six months. Now the actual speaker refuses to,take a charge anymore. I don't know what to do because they aren't going to replace the unit, so the best thing I can do is warn other potential buyers that while this speaker sounds great, you can't count on it to last for long and the accessories are pretty much junk. Buy at your own risk, I don't care. Don't say you weren't warned.
customer_reviews.author: ken

customer_reviews.title: disappointed after 2 1/2 years.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this device for 2 1/2 years. The sound has worked great. However, the only way I knew my battery needed charging was when the sound suddenly stopped. Today when that happened I tried to charge it and the device would not take a charge - my charging unit indicated it would not take a charge - I tried various charging ports and various cords, same result; one suggestion online was to replace the "mother board." I am an elderly woman with no technical knowledge so suspect my only solution is to replace it. I won't replace it with another Oontz!
customer_reviews.author: Tennessee Katey

customer_reviews.title: Great little Bluetooth speaker.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice speaker for the price. It is very easy to pair with all of your audio devices. I use it mostly with my Amazon Echo Dot. I cannot attest to the amount of play time on a full charge because I leave mine plugged in all of the time. To keep it from going into power saving mode and shutting off, I use an audio cable instead of Bluetooth to connect to my Echo Dot. The sound quality is good and this is a nice looking speaker. I would buy it again. I think that most people would be happy with this speaker.
customer_reviews.author: C. Morrow

customer_reviews.title: Nice speaker for the money, however...
customer_reviews.text: ...the Bluetooth on my speaker was spotty. I have an iPhone SE and the Bluetooth would drop out randomly, sometimes with the phone right next to it. Other than this issue, which I believe to be a faulty speaker, it worked flawlessly. Sound quality is pretty good; bass response is decent, however you have to be picky on the surface type as this affects how the bass response is due to the downward-firing bass. I returned this speaker after three weeks, but I would recommend this speaker to others and I plan on replacing it with another one to see if it was just a problem with my particular speaker and not the brand.
customer_reviews.author: Zaffer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my use.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a speaker to listen to siriusXM in my truck which has no radio capable of providing it. I listen to SiriusXM via bluetooth through my cell phone and the sound is excellent. The speaker doesn't bounce around due to its weight and rubber strips on the bottom. Suits my purpose perfectly. I would give it 5 stars for sound quality but the majority of my listening is on the Radio Classics channel which broadcasts old radio programs from the 30s -50s so it wouldn't be fair to say it is a 5 when I am not sure others would feel it so. To me, it's sound quality is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer John Y

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality is good and enough bass to make me happy when placed ...
customer_reviews.text: Its exactly as what I expected for $35. Here is what I found after 4 months. Pro: Sound quality is good and enough bass to make me happy when placed on a hard surface. What is outrageous is the battery life. I typically use lower volume and get 20 - 30 hours between charges. It will tell you when its time to charge as it will not want to associate and the sound quality will be choppy. Con: The Blue tooth reach seems to be limited to about 20 feet and you may need to turn it off/on to reassociate afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: John Comphel

customer_reviews.title: I am pretty impressed.
customer_reviews.text: For the low price I wasn't expecting much but I have to say I am impressed with this speaker. It sounds great, looks great and seems well made, and is easy to use. The sound quality is sufficient for my needs but likely would not impress a hip-hop aficionado. Indoors it fills a moderate sized room with sound and the bass sounds fine. The blue tooth will work to my Iphone 40 feet across my back yard and so far the battery life seems good. I hope it lasts a few years. I would absolutely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Brian T

customer_reviews.title: Poor range. Music skips and cut off frequently.
customer_reviews.text: Battery life and sound quality are decent, but the Bluetooth connectivity could easily give you a headache. It has short range, and only works when nothing is blocking it. If you put the speaker behind a wall or if you stand in front of it, the music will skip and cut off. Distortion may also occur. So far the worse I’ve seen. Really poor range. Works great when is on “ line of sight “. If you don’t mind keeping the speaker next to the connected audio source, then, this is the perfect product.
customer_reviews.author: Whistle blower

customer_reviews.title: Great Speaker for the Money
customer_reviews.text: Bought my kids an Oontz Angle about 6 years ago for their first bluetooth speaker. They've been using them ever since on a regular basis. Saw this on a deal and upgraded them both for a great price. These things are so much louder and better quality so both girls were pretty happy to get them. The only down side is that the music coming from the bathroom during showers is so much louder now we have to turn up the TV.
customer_reviews.author: Morris

customer_reviews.title: Are You Looking to Be Pleased?
customer_reviews.text: I added velcro and used this thing daily in my old vehicle bc only the radio worked at the time. It was very portable, easy to lug, and the sound quality remains top notch. I have since purchased a new vehicle, so now I use this daily in my apartment, including near the sink when I’m in the bathroom getting ready. Be mindful of where you put it bc the bass is so good it falls off the edge of things sometimes. Not a big problem since the edges are rubber. I love this thing so much. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Crabby Patti

customer_reviews.title: Unbeatable, great quality, great price
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely unbeatable for the price. I’ll probably never buy another brand. There’s a newer version where you can link up multiple speakers together for I think the same price, I’d suggest buying that one, I’m just rating this version because it’s what I have. It’s incredibly loud and totally waterproof, I use it in the shower all the time. The battery life is great too. It’s really convenient that it’ll let you take phone calls through it too.
customer_reviews.author: Raechel Zemaitis

customer_reviews.title: Tiny speaker, big sound
customer_reviews.text: Great companion for Echo Dot and Alexa. I was surprised by how much sound comes out of this tiny speaker, it's impressive! I would not consider this for room-filling sound, but it's perfect for secondary locations - I have one in the kitchen and one in the basement, and the sound quality is excellent and well balanced. I didn't expect earth-shattering bass but this little powerhouse delivers a solid bottom end nonetheless. Bonus: the speaker does not shut off automatically when connected to AC power.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Broge

customer_reviews.title: This thing rocks!  Thrashing it and still going strong...
customer_reviews.text: Held off on my review until I got some weeks in of thrashing it and running it through the wringer. Recently, played it hard for a couple of days while cleaning up a house that was flooded in Friendswood, TX after hurricane Harvey. Holy crap, for its size, this thing rocks. Neighbors 2-3 houses away could hear it clear. No problems AT ALL with charging, instantly connecting, battery life, etc. Bluetooth range is low, however, I can't picture a scenario where you would NEED your source far away from this speaker to begin with. If you are going somewhere, take it with you, come on...
customer_reviews.author: Hmmmm....

customer_reviews.title: JUST BUY IT
customer_reviews.text: This bad boy... out of the box just turned on, connecting it to my phone took just seconds and its performance blew my mind. For a bluetooth speaker at 20-30 price tag, the sound is amazing. I take this one over any other brand like JBL or BOSE. At first my wife thought that I just spent like 100+ on one of those brand name speakers, like I said its performance and look appear to be of an expensive item. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Emmanuel

customer_reviews.title: Long angle 3 vs angle 3 plus.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a couple of the regular angle 3's and thought I may give this one a try do to the longer battery life. In short it's a bit less loud and believe it or not the basic angle 3 sounds noticeably louder and clearer. That being said I am keeping the speaker for the long battery life. It will be a perfect beach companion.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Charland

customer_reviews.title: WOW!
customer_reviews.text: I must confess, even with all the good reviews, I was leery about this speaker. The price point in my recent experiences has never yielded a speaker that was anywhere near decent. But, to my surprise, this little speaker delivers! I've had it a little under a week and use it every day while I cook. This little thing packs some punch. The sound is clear, has good bass for this price point, good distance for bluetooth connection, and lightweight. I love this thing. The buttons are easy to use and the bluetooth connected almost immediately. I will be buying another one so my daughter can have her own.
customer_reviews.author: Picture Not Perfect

customer_reviews.title: Battery lasts forever and sound great!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing batter! and great sound in my opinion. Most use it in our bathroom to play music while showering and rarely have to charge it. I took it outside on a hot day to do yard work for about 8 hours and it didn't die. it probably had about a half or less of a charge. I also love being able to take it to the pool and not worry about it getting splashed. The rubber ends are nice to incase I drop it, might help not to break hopefully! cause thats how i broke my last one.
customer_reviews.author: Taran Barber

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound With Song Control
customer_reviews.text: Great sound! Loud and clear with crisp highs and full rich lows! I use it on my kayak attached to a secured lanyard. Replaces another Oontz which I used for years until it got dunked. I tried the waterproof Raindance but didn’t like the muffled sounds and returned it. This Plus like my previous speaker is only splash proof, but thankfully it now allows skipping and repeating of songs. I just have to be careful not to drown it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I am very happy with the amount of sound and clarity that comes from this product. I have heard many bluetooth speakers but this one is exceptional for the price. The bass and depth of sound is amazing and the over all loudness is perfect. I use it while doing construction, no need to carry a boom box, just plug in my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little gem.
customer_reviews.text: This little speaker will blow your mind. Super loud with great bass. Links up easily to my phone. It's small enough to take anywhere. Trust me this little gem even out does my buddy's $100 JBL. It's only flaw is it doesn't have much range between the device and the speaker.. still an awesome little speaker. You can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: David Stokes

customer_reviews.title: Pretty amazing sound and features for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this quite a while ago: it was cheap enough that I could not resist. I was very impressed with the sound quality, and the battery life is surprisingly good too. I've found it can be a bit finicky to connect to bluetooth devices - I often have to force disconnect and reconnect to get things working again...but usually not a problem. I have an older bluetooth speaker that was 5 times as expensive, and doesn't sound any better...maybe not quite as good, and with worse battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A. Sikes

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this if you are looking for something that will last.
customer_reviews.text: When I bought the first one, sound was good for small speaker. Unfortunately, they die after a while and can't be fixed. Mine wouldn't charge and wouldn't turn on even when plugged in. took it apart to see if it was a bad battery, but the battery read 4.0 volts. Just to confirm, I powered it with my variable DC supply and it still wouldn'turn on. Save your money and look for something built in US.
customer_reviews.author: Shifty

customer_reviews.title: You'll get better sound quality from a good pair of in ear ...
customer_reviews.text: The little speaker with a Napoleon complex . This thing cranks! I am impressed with the bass - you can see the cones pulling against their rubber moorings as they pound out the tunes. Having said that, the laws of physics still apply - the tiny cones cannot compete with cones in bookshelf or bigger speakers with cones double their size. Also with the flamboyant motion comes a certain loss of quality of sound. But they do not buzz or hum. You'll get better sound quality from a good pair of in ear headphones, but that's just a party for one. If you're getting down all over town and on the cheap, this little guy is what you're looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Adam DeRidder

customer_reviews.title: Great sound AND price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this speaker because my son had one and I was so impressed with the sound. I planned to use it with my Echo via Bluetooth. My husband has hearing loss and when we play games with the Echo he can hear everything so much better with this speaker and the music and radio stations I play from the Echo now have much improved sound. Another big plus for me is using it as an I-Pod speaker. I have an old Nano with no Bluetooth so I didn't even realize it was going to have an adapter plug where I can just connect my old Nano directly into it. Again, great sound!
customer_reviews.author: Linda from Lugoff

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and sound
customer_reviews.text: This speaker advertises bass and that it indeed has. This little guy puts out impressive sound and gets very loud never loosing clarity and without distortion. It is so convenient to easily carry wherever you go or move it wherever you want. I am a person who prefers the sound from 20 watts but from 10 this speaker is of better quality and better sound than any other I have found within the 10 watt selection. And the battery life is amazing! This is my go to speaker when loud clear sound and portability is what I am after. Perfect for home use and boy does the sound carry. Also great for parties and any outside use large or small.
customer_reviews.author: barry

customer_reviews.title: Big sound, compact package. Get it
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a portable BT speaker the Oontz A3 Plus is the one you want. Incredibly well priced, construction is solid and the sound is phenomenal for a six in 10W speaker. Recieved mine 4 days ago and two other people ordered one after seeing mine. I do recommend the LTgem case. I travel extensively, this case fits perfectly with room for USB/3.5 cables and I have zero worries it wont protect the speaker.
customer_reviews.author: A. Winter

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, long life
customer_reviews.text: There’s a reason this speaker is top-rated by C-Net: because it’s the best. We use ours in the yard and around the house. I even bring it into the shower! It provides excellent sound quality, and the battery lasts for ages. The controls are superior to my older, weaker Bluetooth speaker. Range is decent; approximately 35 to 40 feet, through walls. I also like the included audio cable and jack for direct (non-Bluetooth) operation. An excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Some Guy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the original version of the speaker four years ago. I used that speaker over 50 hours per week for 4 years and it worked flawlessly. I finally decided to upgrade after the charging port on the original speaker was having some issues. The reason I came back to this brand was how good the first speaker sound quality was, and this speaker even sounds better. Has a better quality of sound, more bass definition. The oiginal speaker battery would last for over 11 hours of continuous play time. I hope this new speaker will also hold up as well.
customer_reviews.author: T.

customer_reviews.title: No regrets
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with this speaker. I did entertain the thought of buying a Bose speaker but I am very satisfied with buying this much less Expensive unit. The sound is decent, the size is perfect, and the battery life is very good. I compared it to my daughters Bose speaker. The Bose has a much better bass tone and overall sound but you don’t know what you are missing until you compare them. This speaker by itself sounds plenty good and it’s a perfect partner to bring to the gym. I would buy it again and if I need a second speaker for any application, I would probably buy this one.
customer_reviews.author: doc

customer_reviews.title: Great full sound and excellent battery life
customer_reviews.text: This speaker works great on the beach, in an older car without bluetooth, in the drink pouch of your backpack, in the gym, etc. I've paired this with multiple Samsung phones and Windows computers without any problems. The battery life is so good that I have to remember to eventually charge it after taking it on multiple outings... usually at the end of the week after gym/hiking/driving usage... or at the end of a LONG day at the beach just to keep it ready for the next outing.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and Bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and Bluetooth. I put the speaker on the first floor and walked up to the corner of the attic and I could still hear the speaker and Bluetooth didn’t break up. People say it slides on tables but it’s because of dust. Clean the surface the speaker is on and it doesn’t move. Also clean the rubber feet if they get dirty. I also bought the angle 3 ultra and I think this unit is actually a tad louder and clearer but the ultra can be paired so that may be a better option if it’s not just being used for a portable carry around speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Blowme

customer_reviews.title: dropped on the floor (by accident) and still works fine. No skipping issues
customer_reviews.text: Has been water splashed, scratched by my kitty, dropped on the floor (by accident) and still works fine. No skipping issues. Wasn't able to check how long the battery lasts but i didn't have to charge during my first week of use (i play music every time i study or put my movies on speaker which is roughly 4-5 hrs a day). All in all, worth every penny. Even my Lily likes it.
customer_reviews.author: CO632

customer_reviews.title: Beast of portable speakers
customer_reviews.text: Great speaker. Connects fast and easy with any phone I tried (Samsung S6, iPhone 6, LG phones, Nexus 6P and Pixel) no problems with any of them. Battery last long time even on max volume. Sound is clear and loud for such small speaker it is impressive. Definitely worth the money for $35 you can't go worng. I am actually going to buy another one because like it so much. I have friends thinking that this was some higher end type of speaker and when I told them that it wasn't and how much it cost they would be ordering same day. Buy it and you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: SPARTAN

customer_reviews.title: Nice blue tooth speaker
customer_reviews.text: I love this speaker! It has great sound and is so portable. I haven't used it anywhere but my house, but I plan on taking it camping with me. It's range is good, I can take it to another room at the other end of my house that is almost 40 feet away and around two corners. Update: Just recently the Bluetooth part of this speaker quit working. I could plug it into my laptop and it would work, but not the Bluetooth. Since it was past the return for Amazon, I contacted the seller and they were very quick to respond and sent me a new one for a small shipping cost, no questions asked. Very good company!
customer_reviews.author: M. Sample

customer_reviews.title: Does and apparently hold up past 90-day warranty. But I hope it does for most people b/c it's great
customer_reviews.text: Oh get this send a 5 out of 5 if it lasted longer than it did. After the 90-day warranty the thing just dropped in quality like a rock. First I started to hear in this rattling sound that turned out one to be one of the screws from the front drivers had backed out completely and rattlin. Then there was a second one. Other than that it sounded as good as it did as the first day I received it but that doesn't make up for the misscumings.
customer_reviews.author: Garbonzo

customer_reviews.title: Great little speaker.
customer_reviews.text: Great little speaker for it's size. I use this at work when there's downtime. It's a small unit so the amount of sound it will put out is impressive for it's size. The bass is a little light which is to be expected. Lasts 5 or 6 hours without a charge and is very easy to pair with.
customer_reviews.author: LanFear

customer_reviews.title: Nice travel unit
customer_reviews.text: Nice travel unit, but I often use it around the house with an iPod or a computer that lacks volume. This unit does a nice job of rendering music. It's not the equal of a classic big speaker stereo, but it doesn't cost thousands of dollars either. It's sound is a less muddy than my little pair of Bose speakers I bought for over three times the price. It's not as loud, but it is easier to use (BlueTooth or aux input) and there are no wires to trip on. Like it enough I might buy a second one. The price was fantastic at about $30. It is tough and hefty enough to not lose bass sounds. Delivery was fast.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Gilberts

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, great battery
customer_reviews.text: I bought this speaker wht the intention of using it while I was in labor. Well, I had it playing for about 19 hours straight while in hard labor through delivery of my baby. I turned it off for a while afterward while we got situated. I turned it back on later and let it run through the night. So I think I let it play for probably 30ish hours (maybe more) on one charge at a lower volume. The sound is very clear, even at higher volumes. It doesn't get grainy or overly bassy. The higher volume fills the room fantastically. It was a very worthwhile investment.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: A Great Little Speaker!
customer_reviews.text: I've been actively using this speaker in a direct connection with my system as a speaker to by-pass the internal speaker. It's thus far surpassed my expectations and has great sound. I have yet to actively run it in Bluetooth mood though. I'll be testing it in the Bluetooth mood at months end when I'll be doing vacation, that will be the real test of this speaker. The only issue I've encountered thus far, is a slight line noise from time to time. In passed expeniences, this is usually caused by a bad direst cable connection.
customer_reviews.author: Tango Down

customer_reviews.title: LOUD with Great Bass
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this thing BUMPS. I had pretty high expectations because of all the positive reviews, but even so when I first connected it and turned it all the way up, my jaw still dropped. How can something so small be so loud and have such good bass? How can it fit a battery large enough to power so much sound for so long? It’s seriously magic.
customer_reviews.author: J. Perry

customer_reviews.title: Didn't know what to expect but I am very pleased with this speaker
customer_reviews.text: Didn't know what to expect but I am very pleased with this speaker...nice clarity good bass, solid build, good battery life...definitely worth the purchase...
customer_reviews.author: SilverbackV

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: So glad I purchased this speaker. It has good base and good sound, with enough output it'll vibrate itself off the counter if you really push it. The bluetooth works up to about 25-30 feet away through a couple walls, but it does start to get choppy much further than that. Setup was quick and easy, connected it to my iphone7 without any issues. We use this all the time in our kitchen to listen to music while we cook as a family and it has more than enough volume to be heard over the sink, pans on the stove, and an exhaust vent. We've had this for almost a year and been very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Riley

customer_reviews.title: A reasonable speaker for the price
customer_reviews.text: My employer aggressively blocks all music streaming over our network, so I bought this speaker to listen to Spotify through my iphone over the public wifi (which isn't blocked). The sound quality is okay. It reminds me of listening to a portable radio "back in the day" - a bit "tinny," but about what I expected from a small speaker in this price range. Pros: the setup was super easy - the speaker paired automatically with my phone and I was able to start using it immediately. The speaker is small and unobtrusive on my desk. Cons: I wish it came with an adapter so I can charge it from a wall outlet instead of just an HDMI port.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, good battery life
customer_reviews.text: I needed a compact, portable BlueTooth speaker and, after reading numerous reviews on Amazon and elsewhere, I gave this one a try. So far I've been very pleased with only one problem. The problem may be with an app I use not the speaker, but I can't use it at night when I go to sleep because when it turns off, the volume suddenly blasts loud. Oh well. It works fine the rest of the time.
customer_reviews.author: RickT5

customer_reviews.title: Buy this... don’t waste money on a “nice” speaker
customer_reviews.text: I was recently in the market for a little speaker and was thinking maybe I’d splurge on a “nice” one. After looking and realizing no way would I spend that much on a little speaker I decided to go with this one after seeing all of the good reviews. Honestly, could not be happier that I gave this little guy a chance. The sound is very comparable for the average non critical consumer, especially with price taken into consideration. Also cannot remember the last time I charged this thing, the battery life is great.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Schlink

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars for what it is...
customer_reviews.text: ...a cheap, small, portable, chargeable bluetooth speaker. Plus, no smart speaker features which means it's not listening to my conversations or household noise! It has one job and it does it well. Don't expect a super high quality sound from this speaker and you'll be happy. IMO this is a bargain buy. I've used it to pair with my phone and a bluetooth record player. No problems. Mine is 2 years old. I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: RunLolaRun

customer_reviews.title: Need a good BT speaker?  Look no further!
customer_reviews.text: Loving this so far!! After summers of opening windows and facing indoor speakers out so I can play tunes on the back deck, I finally caved and tried a bluetooth speaker and I'm LOVING it!! Got this little guy which packs quite a punch despite it's size (8x3") and it didn't break the bank. Links easily and sounds clean and clear (deep but not overly bassy, which I hate), has song-skip capability and a built-in mic in case someone calls (no one does, so moot point). Wishing I'd done this sooner!
customer_reviews.author: R. Stott

customer_reviews.title: Pretty much water proof
customer_reviews.text: I went kayaking with a bunch of friends over the summer, and i accidentally dropped this speaker in the river. It fully submerged for a split second and then I retrieved it. It kept playing without a problem. I was so surprised and relieved. I will continue buying Oontz speakers for the workmanship and sound quality. I just bought the Oontz Angle 3 Ultra Dou to replace the one I just lost at a New Years party.
customer_reviews.author: cat8

customer_reviews.title: I am one extremely happy customer!
customer_reviews.text: I was blown away by this speaker. I bought Craig blue tooth speaker from Rite Aid when it was on clearance. I was lucky if the range was 5 feet without distortion, loss of signal (you get what you pay for). I received my OontZ last night and charged it over night. I tested it out today. I live in a mobile home and I put the speaker in the back bedroom, was walking with my ipod towards the front bedroom. The first sign of cutting out came when I was about half way to the front bedroom...at LEAST 60 feet! I can only imagine the range outside where there is no walls. I am one extremely happy customer!!!!
customer_reviews.author: love electronics

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, and I got it to work with my Echo..
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: Oontz support recommended that I reset the Echo and then connect the Echo to the speaker. It worked! Rating upgraded to 5 stars because it now does exactly what I bought it for. Great sound, but it doesn't work with my Amazon Echo. It pairs & connects, but no sound. I can successfully connect to my phone and other devices. The Echo has worked with a Bose BT speaker and a Yamaha soundbar. For some reason these two items (both purchased from Amazon) don't play well.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly great!
customer_reviews.text: I work in a loud factory and this does the deed. I've use this thing everywhere: at work, by the fire, in the house, my buddy's car while road tripping because he didnt have a functioning stereo, even tubing on the river. The battery life on this sucker is amazing as well. I've dropped it a dozen times and it didnt hurt it. Controls are simple and easy to use. Sound quality is pretty good with a bassy punch for the size. For the price you cant go wrong!
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Would be 5 stars, but...
customer_reviews.text: I really like the easy pairing and sound quality of this speaker. We use it outside, and it sounds great The battery lasts a long time on a single charge. However, I do wish that Cambridge would have made the 'buttons' a different color. I had to fill in the buttons with white nail polish to be able to see what we are pressing in lower light. This is the only reason why I deducted a star. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price@
customer_reviews.text: This product is perfect for what we need...plug into laptop, use with mobile devices, or just for traveling. I've had this product for a few months so I wanted to wait for my review. So far this speaker has been dropped (by my children), been used daily for listening to music, movies, etc..., and for connectivity anywhere that has bluetooth capabilities. I love this gadget. It's simple, holds a charge, and has ample enough sound that is as quality output. Use at the pool, in your home, and anywhere you need speedy and quality sound and connection.
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: The basic OontZ Angle 3 is louder better than the Plus - save your money
customer_reviews.text: Since I bought and really liked the basic OontZ Angle 3 10 watt speaker I decided to treat myself to an upgrade so bought this PLUS EDITION. I cannot say it sounded any better than the basic Angle 3, paid more, was not better. After using both occasionally for a year the Plus began to not turn on so I followed the instructions to reset it. What a disappointment - The PLUS now has HALF THE VOLUME of the basic Oontz Angle 3. Buy the Angle 3, the Plus model was no better and now it is worse. What a bummer.
customer_reviews.author: HereComeDeJudge

customer_reviews.title: Use and abuse, works great!
customer_reviews.text: I mostly use this speaker when I’m working cattle or fixing fencing, works great sounds great and is audible around 30 or so feet away, waterproofing works trust me, this is also durable as most of the time it’s bungee corded to the back of an ATV playing music while I ride and fix fencing or piping. Very pleased with this speaker for the money, also fills up my apartment with high quality music when I’m not at work. Bluetooth signal only goes about 15 feet so I usually leave my phone in the saddlebag Next to it
customer_reviews.author: Bryan B.

customer_reviews.title: Could be a diamond in the rough
customer_reviews.text: This is not a high-end, luxury bluetooth speaker but for the price you certainly get a LOT more than what you pay for. It is certainly at the doorstep of the other higher-end portable speakers. The sound doesn't feel tiny, it fills an entire room for the size. I'm not an audiophile either, I just wanted a great speaker for my tablet and phone (Netflix, Spotify, etc...) and this certainly more than does the job! Overall I wouldn't classify this as a budget speaker. It's more into the mid to upscale category but not a high-end one. Oh, did I mention that it's kinda so easy to clean?
customer_reviews.author: Ravenspur

customer_reviews.title: Loud for its size
customer_reviews.text: You would think a little speaker like this would produce little sound. Well...you are mistaken. This little guy punches above it weight. Its sound fills the room and even when the volume is maxed out there isnt any distortion or clipping. In retrospect im glad i picked this one over the other ones that i was looking at. Its perfect to bring with anywhere with you and the charge lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Damian Breton

customer_reviews.title: Great For Podcasts
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is on the "inexpensive" side of the range, so I didn't expect high fidelity. I enjoy podcasts, and I wanted to get free from using earbuds. The Oontz works very well for that, producing clear voices with plenty of volume. It is also OK for music--better than I expected given the price and small size. It links up easily to my iPhone or Mac. The controls are well marked and easy to use, and battery life is good.
customer_reviews.author: Ward

customer_reviews.title: Best non-bose bluetooth speaker i've ever heard.
customer_reviews.text: I've owned an Oontz angle for 2 years and then I bought one for my aunt and dad. after 2 years all 3 Oontz's still work fine but I wanted more bass and more power so I bought this and an anker soundcore 2. This beat the soundcore in it's ability to have good clean sound. this speaker has highs, mids, and lows not just mids and bass. I like the angle of the speaker along with it's good battery life and water proof construction.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Westwood

customer_reviews.title: decent quality and sound
customer_reviews.text: i guess a 37 dollar speaker is a good price, what, with decent sound like this one has... doesnt distort badly, at loud setting... decent for on the go or interior work site speaker. bass is not alot But ok. some of the Jbl,s speakers are nice but may cost double of this, but those have a stronger bass and louder. i like the angle design. there are hundreds of "under $40 speakers now. so any one you buy would be similar. i got this one at a discounted price at around 24 bucks from this dealer and well worth it, at that.
customer_reviews.author: PC Gera

product_meta.title: OontZ Angle 3 Plus - Portable Bluetooth Speaker, Superior Stereo Sound, 10+ Watts for Louder Volume, Richer Bass, IPX5, Incredible 30 Hour Battery Playtime, Bluetooth Speakers by Cambridge SoundWorks
feature_bullets: HIGH QUALITY CRYSTAL CLEAR SOUND distinct mids and highs from our two precision acoustic drivers delivers excellent stereo sound and enhanced bass from our proprietary passive bass radiator design
LOUDER VOLUME & MORE BASS distortion-free at maximum volume; room filling sound, perfect for home, dorm room, kitchen, bathroom, car, parties

WATER RESISTANT IPX5 splashproof, rainproof, dustproof, sandproof; outdoor shower speaker, perfect for the beach, poolside, car, boat & golf cart -- IPX5 rating speaker can resist gentle water spray & splash but cannot be partially or fully submerged

EXCEPTIONAL 30 HOUR BATTERY PLAYTIME --- 4400MaH battery capacity provides up to 30 hours playing at 2/3 of max volume -- Portable Design just 13 ounces, and 6.5” long and 2.8” high, perfect for travel and long weekends trips

CONNECT OVER BLUETOOTH IN SECONDS to: iPhone, iPad, iPod, Mac, Smartphones, Tablets, Laptops, Computers, Chromebooks ---- Works great with Amazon Echo and Amazon Echo Dot---- To play from non-Bluetooth devices and TVs use the included 3.5mm audio cable

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars7,840 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
specifications.Best Sellers Rank: #785 in Portable Bluetooth Speakers#6,133 in MP3 & MP4 Player Accessories
